heading: Fanclub Information
body: It is with great regret that we hereby have to inform that the Earth chapter of the Space Marauders FC is now put in legacy mode. This means that no more yearly fanclub gifts will be produced, although all past members may still retain their honorary membership and continue to call themselves Space Marauders. The reason comes down to the simple economical facts of declining membership numbers combined with difficulties in coming up with new ideas for fanclub gifts that are possible to produce in sufficiently low numbers. We thank you all for all these years of support, Space Marauders! All other operations will of course continue like before and we are now focusing all our efforts on finalizing the next Armory album. Keep your eyes to the skies, Marauders!

heading: Gig Announcements
body: 2025 will see Armory head back to Earth for new live strikes! First up is Stockholm and Motala in February, with more concerts in the works. Stay tuned and hope to see you all on the road!

heading: European Tour Announcement!
body: In October we will hit the road together with our brothers in Acid Blade for 10 nights of mayhem. Check the TOUR section for details. Hope to see you all on the road!

heading: Space Marauders 2023
body: The registration is now open for the 2023 of our very own fanclub, the Space Marauders. Check out more and sign up HERE. Have a heavy 2023 Marauders, and don't forget to VOTE for your favourite songs for the setlist on our 10th year anniversary show next month (the vote closes in 3 weeks).

heading: 10 years of hyper speed metal
body:
In order to celebrate our 10th anniversary as a band, we would like to invite all of our fans to a VERY special show in Gothenburg on February 24, 2023. We will be sharing the stage with none other than DEATHHAMMER and WARHAWK! And to spice things up even further, it's up to YOU, the fans, to decide our setlist! You can vote for your favourite songs HERE until 1 month before the show.

Poster by Turborock Productions.

heading: Sci fi or die!
body:
We join forces with our allies in Acid Blade (Germany) and Aquilla (Poland) for the two finishing battles on their European POWER LIVE tour this October.

2022-10-21: Bomber Bar, Motala

2022-10-22: Bullet Bar, Växjö

heading: Orbital strikes detected! Take shelter!
body:
Make sure to stay well away from the following coordinates in the space-time continuum as they will be hit with heavy orbital strikes of blazing hot metal:

2022-06-05: Muskelrock, Småland, Earth

2022-09-09: Klubb Fredagsmangel, Stockholm, Earth (new date)

2022-09-10: Sandviken Heavy Metal Army Club, Sandviken, Earth (new date)

Check out the TOUR section for our complete flight chart!

heading: Mercurion
body: Our third album Mercurion is out planetwide today! It's a science fiction concept album, available on CD, gatefold LP, and digital. Get it now through Dying Victims or Jawbreaker Records!

heading: New music video
body: Our new music video for the song Wormhole Escape (taken from the forthcoming LP Mercurion) has just been unleashed, check it out!

heading: Gig announcements
body: Two new gigs have been added to the TOUR section. First off, we will land in Denmark to join the Metal Magic Warmup Party on April 30. Next up we will host a massive release party for Mercurion at The Abyss in Gothenburg on May 7. Hope to see you there!

heading: New album out soon!
body: Our new album Mercurion will be out through Dying Victims Productions on 2022-04-22. Pre-order here!

heading: Space Marauders 2022
body: Greetings from Space Marauders! Registration is now open for the 2022 edition of our official fanclub, the Space Marauders. As usual, a secret gift will be sent out to all those who join. Interested? JOIN NOW. Thanks for supporting the underground!

heading: In quarantine again
body: Greetings from afar! Unfortunately we have some bad news this time. We are forced to go back into stasis due to the widespread panicking of Earth politicians when they heard about our imminent arrival. Don't be alarmed though, as our ship computer will continue to plan for new landing sites. Stay alive out there and we will see you soon!

heading: Follow us with RSS
body:
You can now follow all news from us using RSS. Just add this feed link to your RSS reader.

If you do not know what RSS is, it is an awesome technology invented in 1999 that allows you to subscribe to various feeds online. Compared to other alternatives such as an email newsletter or social media, there are no intermediaries that can choose to censor posts when using RSS. That means that you will decide for yourself what information you want to see, rather than giving over that control to an algorithm. To get started you just need an RSS reader like Inoreader, Feedly, or NetNewsWire.

heading: More gigs confirmed
body:
We are finally back in the Milky Way and have now confirmed a bunch of new landing dates:

2021-10-03: The Abyss, Gothenburg, Sweden

2022-01-08: Klubb Fredagsmangel, Stockholm, Sweden

2022-01-15: Klubb Dissonans, Jönköping, Sweden (Opening for DARKNESS)

Check out the TOUR section for our complete flight chart!

heading: See you on the road!
body: Finally it seems like we can start playing live again on Planet Earth soon! The first confirmed gig so far will take place in Nässjö, Sweden on August 21th 2021. Awesome support band of the night will be none other than the mighty Commando. More gig announcements to follow... Want us to land in your city? Let us know!

heading: Space Marauders 2021
body: The 2021 edition of our fanclub, the SPACE MARAUDERS, is now open for registration. Like always, you will get some very exclusive merch as thanks for joining, and you will also continue to support underground speed metal! Your membership will be extra valuable this year, as we will enter Black Path Studios very soon in order to record our next album. Therefore we need all the funds we can get. Head over to the FANCLUB section to read more.

heading: Support the underground
body: Unfortunately all gigs except the first one of our Solar System 2020 Tour had to be cancelled/postponed, as you already know. Support underground speed metal by purchasing the tour shirt anyway at Jawbreaker.se!

heading: Show With Darkness Rescheduled
body: We have our first gig for 2022 already secured. It's the show together with thrash legends Darkness in Jönköping, that was originally planned to take place in April 2020, that has now been rescheduled to January 2022. (We are in the big league now, booking gigs over a year in advance).

heading: New Restrictions
body: Thanks for the wild night in Malmö last Saturday, Marauders! The city will probably take a long time to rebuild again. Unfortunately our upcoming shows in Motala and Nässjö will have to be cancelled/postponed due to the new and stricter restrictions from the Swedish government. We will let you know as soon as the restrictions are lifted again. We will return!

heading: Upcoming Album And Live Gigs!
body: Greetings Marauders! You haven't heard from us in a while... That is because we have been busy writing our new album! It will be a concept album and will be recorded early next year. To wet your appetite though, we have decided to do a small tour this November and play the upcoming album in its enterity!!! Go to the TOUR section to see all the upcoming dates. Stay fast!

heading: A Message From Space
body:
Unfortunately but not surprisingly our gig at The Abyss together with Ambush has been postponed to an unknown date. As all of our concerts are either cancelled or postponed, we stand without income at the moment. If you would like to show your support you can join our fanclub for just 100 SEK and you will get a killer fanclub package in return.

Follow this hyperlink to read more.

heading: Space Marauders 2020
body: The 2020 edition of the Space Marauders, also known as the fastest fanclub in the known universe, is now open for registration. As usual, membership is only 100 SEK and included in the price is a very special gift. We know we say this every year, but this year's secret will be something extraordinary indeed! If you are ready to step into the unknown, follow this hyperlink.

heading: Outbreak of Evil
body: Unfortunately our gig with Darkness on 2020-04-04 has been cancelled due to the current quarantine situation on Sol III. Our gig with Ambush in Gothenburg on 2020-04-17 is still on though so make sure to get your tickets here!

This year we are gonna celebrate the official speed metal island day (April 17th or 4/17) at The Abyss in Gothenburg together with reigning heavy metal champions Ambush from Småland. Ambush are in turn celebrating the release of their third album Infidel, out on High Roller Records, so this will be a night to remember. The gig is expected to sell out to make sure to get your tickets in advance.

Tickets available here.

heading: We are opening for DARKNESS!
body:
On the 4th of April 2020 we will return to Jönköping, Småland together with the mighty DARKNESS from Germany. See you there speedfreekz!

Read more and get your tickets here!

heading: Metal Magic
body:
Soon we will head over to Denmark for our first show on Danish ground ever. The location will be non other than the legendary Metal Magic Festival in Fredericia on July 11-13th. Our gig is on Friday the 12th, but beware that we will stay for the whole festival and have a wild time with everyone! See you there!

Read more and get your tickets here!

heading: Noselake Metal Festival
body:
On June the 28th we will return once more to Småland, this time to lay waste to the town of Nässjö at Noselake Metal Festival. Two days of heavy metal with many killer bands!
Get your tickets here!

heading: Armory Online
body: Website launched.

heading: Music Video
body:
Our first music video is out now! The song is Vault Seven from our latest album The Search, out now through High Roller Records. The video was directed by the mighty Jim Nedergård and is a dark story about invisible enemies, paranoia and the dangerous power of forbidden knowledge.

Watch it here!

heading: The Search Out Today!
body: It is Friday the 13th and our second full-length album The Search is released today by High Roller Records!
